CustomField.formula: IF(Wages__c > 0, Wages__c - Total_Approved_Salary__c, Item_Budget__c - Fringe_Benefits__c - Total_Approved_Salary__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: if Wages > 0: Wages - Total Approved Salary; else: Item Budget - Fringe Benefits - Total Approved Salary
CustomField.label: Labor Balance
